name: Behaviors.js
tagline: JavaScript library that uses HTML directives for progressive enhancement
body:
Behaviors.JS ============ JavaScript libraries that are configured by adding tags and attributes to HTML. The libraries follow the principle of progressive enhancement and have no external dependencies. Compatibility target: IE9+. Will fall back to default behavior on older browsers. Examples -------- ###splice-into Submits forms via AJAX and applies selected updates to the current page.
###characters-left Counts characters remaining in a particular text field or textarea. Uses length from either max-length or data-val-length-max attributes on the target field. ###include-on-proximity Infinite scroller. Inlines target of a link when you scroll close to the said link.
